summary: Cinematic ENB Preset - No weather mods, ELFX and Vanilla Lightning support
descriptionHtml:
[font=Georgia][size=3] [size=5] [color=#ff7700][u][b] Tannmark ENB[/b][/u][/color][/size]



[color=#f4f4f4]Hello there,

Here is my newest ENB Preset. It took some time to get everything balanced, but I guess its playable now :D

Improvements over my older ENB's (mostly Wallachei ENB):

[/color][/size][/font][list]
[*][font=Georgia][color=#f4f4f4][size=3] Colors are more balanced[/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Georgia][color=#f4f4f4][size=3] The unloved purple ambient color is gone[/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Georgia][color=#f4f4f4][size=3] AmbientOccolusion is not longer that intensive[/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Georgia][color=#f4f4f4][size=3] Faces are more natural[/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Georgia][color=#f4f4f4][size=3] Buildings are not longer much brighter than their surroundings[/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Georgia][color=#f4f4f4][size=3] Improved sunset and dawn[/size][/color][/font]
[/list][font=Georgia][color=#f4f4f4][size=3]
Hodilton was so nice to make a video with the Tannmark ENB!

[youtube]8izzgRWYUNU[/youtube]




[size=4][u]Weather and Lighting Mods[/u][/size]


I dont use Weather mods at all, so if you use one, please let me know if it works with this preset. Please keep in mind that weather mod depend on personal taste and they will drasticly influence the look of this ENB!

[color=#00ff00]Compatible mods:[/color]

[/size][/color][/font][list]
[*][font=Georgia][color=#f4f4f4][size=3]Climates of Tamriel [/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Georgia][color=#f4f4f4][size=3]ELFX[/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Georgia][color=#f4f4f4][size=3]Pure Weather [/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Georgia][color=#f4f4f4][size=3]Purity[/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Georgia][color=#f4f4f4][size=3]Vanilla lighting works aswell[/size][/color][/font]
[/list][font=Georgia][color=#f4f4f4][size=3]
[color=#ff0000]Untested Mods:[/color]

[/size][/color][/font][list]
[*][font=Georgia][color=#f4f4f4][size=3]Vivid Weathers[/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Georgia][color=#f4f4f4][size=3]Relighting Skyrim[/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Georgia][color=#f4f4f4][size=3]Realistic Lightning Overhaul[/size][/color][/font]
[/list][font=Georgia][color=#f4f4f4][size=3]
[/size][/color][/font][font=Georgia][color=#f4f4f4][size=3]
[u][size=4]Recommended Mods[/size][/u]

[/size][/color][/font][list]
[*][font=Georgia][color=#f4f4f4][size=3]Enhanced Vanilla Trees[/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Georgia][color=#f4f4f4][size=3]Binary v.236 or higher[/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Georgia][color=#f4f4f4][size=3] AOF Farmhouse/Mountains/Hair[/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Georgia][color=#f4f4f4][size=3] Unbelievable Grass 2[/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Georgia][color=#f4f4f4][size=3]Vivid Woods/Cliffs and Creeks[/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Georgia][color=#f4f4f4][size=3]Realistic Water + Watercolor for ENB[/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Georgia][color=#f4f4f4][size=3]Enhanced Lights and FX[/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Georgia][color=#f4f4f4][size=3]Quality Snow[/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Georgia][color=#f4f4f4][size=3] Diverse Tree Bark[/size][/color][/font]
[/list][font=Georgia][color=#f4f4f4][size=3]

[u][size=4]
Permission[/size][/u]

[/size][/color][/font][left][font=Georgia][color=#f4f4f4][size=3]
If you want to use anything from this preset, get permission from wolfgrimdark and me first!



[u][size=4]Credits[/size][/u]

Wolfgrimdark for screenshots and testing
EMS60 for testing
Boris for the ENB-Series
Bethesda for Skyrim
My Dog for Dawn, Dusk and Sunrays[/size][/color][/font][/left]
author: Chris Kley
